text: The 2020–21 season was Burnley's 139th season of competitive football. It was their 58th in the top level of English football As they were in the Premier League, the club also competed in the FA Cup and EFL Cup. The season was the time between August 2020 to 30 June 2021. They came 17th in the Premier League. == References == Burnley F.C. Category:2021 in association football Category:2020–21 in European football
title: 2020–21 Burnley F.C. season
